reviewText: Got this for my friend and it usually is $20 more on other sites.  From what i heard it includes a video of the girls playing games at some resort which was rather funny.  I think fans of the group will enjoy this.

The "girls" of Girls Generation have had a stellar career course in Korea, Japan and throughout Asia and though they are less well known in the USA they are certainly not "unknown!"  I was introduced to this group by my 17 yeat old daughter and I have been a fan ever since!  The SM Entertainment company that chose, trained, and put together the several groups besides GG did an exemplary job of presenting entertaining mucial/dance groups who can be squeaky clean and yet greatly popular with fans of all ages, not just the pre-teens/teens they may be aimed at.  The girls are beautiful, the tunes are catchy, the dance routines are engaging, and the video editing is spot on! And half the fun is learning the identities of the different members of the group through repeated playing of the videos! Thoroughly enjoyable fare for those tired of all the garbage that passes for music these days.  A fun time for everyone!
